Still an amazing game in 2022.

I always get stuck on a puzzle and think: "This is it. this is where I have to look up a walkthrough". But somehow I always find the patience to solve it myself. I'm not a patient person at all, this game is just so fun.
If you have Steam, you are required to purchase this game. No questions asked
alot of fun puzzles that will have you playing for a couple of hours

比起上作更难了，也更有意思了，不过卡关也是真的卡关，好几个地方都得不断试错或看攻略才能过（捂脸）[spoiler] 好歹我最后真出去了(￣▽￣)，还带着我的第一部没能出来的爱心方块 [/spoiler]
[spoiler] 咱就是说地下那么大坨机构从哪供电啊 [/spoiler]

Ко-оп довольно занимательный и 9 часов прошли не зря.
12 подлянок от Hornet из 10.
Хорошая игра, но играю редко добрые люди играют 6/10 за комьюнити, поэтому вступайте в группу FOPSTEP рады всем.

Slighty better than Portal 1. Really good game overall. Story mode had an actual story to it compared to Portal 1 and a lot more puzzles and levels to go through and solve. There's even a co-op mode with a unique story that works with online play. 8/10

Si estabas dudando si vale la pena o no, animate!!! A estas alturas ya es un clásico y uno de los grandes juegos de Valve. Tiene muy buenos puzzles, grandes personajes y una buena historia, el final es épico. Recomiendo fuertemente jugarlo a ciegas, para no spoilearse la historia (cometí ese error y me arruinó un poco la experiencia) y de buscar pequeños espacios "secretos" en las cámaras de prueba. Lo mejor de todo es que no termina ahí, también tiene un modo co-op con una historia diferente, cámaras de prueba de la comunidad (puzzles hechos por jugadores) y mods, así hay diversión para rato.
real candiate hilarious clinton talks on this radio and calls you plato. then she is. I DONT GET IT
Very good game, can't wait for Portal: Chell when it comes to vr!
killed my friend with a portal, 10/10
Захватывающая история и хорошая головоломка. Охуенно
i love this games story and it was satisfacting and it close on a high note
This game is one of the greatest sequels to one of the greatest games of all time

Pretty fun 2 player game. May or may not have looked up tutorials and then try to act smart by solving it. Also the progression in difficulty is very great and doesnt make it overwhelmingly hard until you learn the game. I had troubles with the voice chat.

9/10
Jackster
From great world-building to story, puzzles, and gameplay mechanics. One of my favorite games of all time.
a cool puzzle game with co-op and a level editor. sold

Portal 2 is a 3D puzzle game that uses portal mechanics to solve levels and navigate through the game. You're probably familiar with it already unless you're very young or have lived under a rock for like... a long time. The puzzles vary in difficulty, but never feel unsolvable. The main reason to check this out is the humor, which was considered a bit dark at the time, but nowadays it's pretty tame compared to what's out there. It's witty and still holds up. 

I came back to this for a nostalgia trip in 2022, last having played in 2010 or so, and I thought I'd grind out the achievements this times. Everything was great until I realized that nearly half of them were co-op achievements. Now, Portal 2 was a big enough deal that it probably still has a fair enough player base (haven't looked into it), but I've got a feeling it's still going to be a pain due to the nature of some of the achievements. (One required pairing with someone who hasn't played co-op before and another requires playing with players specifically from your friends list.) I haven't decided if I'm going to bother yet, but that's really the only negative thing I have to say. It's a masterclass game in my opinion.
Игра затягивает. Много испытаний и есть смешные моменты. Также очень кайфовая музыка. Крайне рекомендую эту игру!
Tout aussi bien que le premier jeu avec des améliorations au niveau du gameplay, AL 9000 version patate et des expériences signées Aperture Science
its realy fun the best game i have played

Вентели, я обожаю вас за такой подход к созданию игр, если бы тогда вы не обратили внимание на группу разрабов-любителей и не предложили им работать над созданитем "Portal 1" то сейчас я бы не поиграл в это прекрасный, местами комичный и местами жуткий, симулятор выживание в лабораторном комлексе со свихнувшейся шутницей на тему мамок GlaDOS
oyun acayip sarıyor arkadaşımla oynadım ve keşke bitmeseydi dediğim oyunlardan biri kesinlikle alın tavsiyemdir
Challenging yet fun. Really makes your mind work. Plus, GladOS is entertaining!
Perfect game to chill to after a long hard day, great storyline and gameplay, never buggy, perfect level design, and the game i'm talking about is Portal 2

Highly recommended, while it was released in 2011 it holds up tremendously with fantastic lighting, fabulous story, and very re-playable gameplay with custom levels and co-op. Have yet to try co-op out though.

Provavelmente um dos melhores jogos da Valve, História magnifica, ambientação fenomenal, mecânicas muito boas, personagens marcantes......

ainda tem o modo co-op dessa obra-prima, e ainda fica 4 reais em promoção!! não é atoa que é o jogo mais bem avaliado da steam

I literally hate puzzle games but this game is so amazing that it made me love them for my time playing it. The characters, story, world, and even the puzzles themselves are all so well made. I wish Valve could count to 3.

also the multiplayer is very fun. Play it.

This game is certainly ahead of its time, and the humor stands through the everchanging time. Its still as funny and relevant as 10 years ago. Great job writers
